availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leroy W. Watson (Caldwell County and Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County and Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Georgia native. Married to Mariah Jane Church Watson in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on March 18, 1834. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 324A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 678.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 227.
